tarot_key2:
Skills: Speaking
Time Limit: 60 minutes
Group Size: 8 - 10
tarot_key4: Make simple tarot cards. For example, you can draw simple pictures or symbols representing
tarot_key16: The number of the card sets should correspond with the number of pairs of students in your class.
tarot_key17: Divide students into pairs and give each pair a set of the cards. Ask students to draw cards and tell each other their fortunes.
tarot_key18: To make the activity more challenging and interesting, a Fortune teller needs to include at least 3 sentences in each fortune.
